value: Delhi - 180 KMs. Buses available from ISBT, Delhi in every 5-10 minutes.
Chandigarh - 240 KMs. Buses available from ISBT, Delhi in every 20-30 minutes.
Jaipur - 360 KMs. Buses available every hour.
Delhi - Three trains daily,Gorkhdham Express,  kissan Express and Haryana express (Sirsa Express)
Bathinda - One train daily Sirsa Express
Jaipur - Two Express trains twice a weekn and one passanger train daily

Small Airport is there. But no commercial flights operating presently.

value: Ladwa Gaushala and cancer Hospital Village Ladwa Hisar
Lazeez Restaurant for Lunch and DInner North Indian and Italian dishes
Pahuja Juice for South Indian and chinese foods speciality
Ram chat Bhandar for street fod tastes like Aalooo lachha tokri
Imarti from Goswami sweets Nagori gate Hisar
PLA Market street for variety spicy foods at lowest price like PAnner tikka, Soya chaap, Hot dog and Mommos
Volga Bakery for Instant baked superior quality foods snacks baked products amd Pizzas
Banarasi dass Halwai for special sweets from the 18th century. Taste is best in the world of Malpura Rabri and Gajarpaak
For non-vegetarian cuisine, there are few very good places, including one Avinash chicken corner at camp chowk Hisar and another at Kabab PLA market Hisar.
Lassi Malai maar kr from Kalu Lasi wala at Parijat chowk Hisar
Rabri Glass from Ram Chat bhandar
HOt Milk (only available in evening) at Goswami seets Nagori gate HIsar
Hotel Palki Red square market Hisar A/C Room 1000 onwards
Govind palace sec 15 Hisar A/C Room 800 onwards
Aggarsen Bhavan green square market Hisar A/C Room 800 onwards
